Epitaph on the death of the much honoured Sr. Rodger Hog, of Harcarse, sometime a senator in the College of Justice.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed [s.n.], Edinburgh : in the year 1700.
Caption title. Mourning border. Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland
